content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)
- Burner mining drill (position y2)

### Iron plate production line at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position z1)
- Assembling machine (position z2) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position z1 to the assembling machine at position z2

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended position.

### Errors in crafting recipes
- Review the required ingredients for crafting recipes and ensure you have all necessary components in your inventory before starting the crafting process.
